title: I need help
body:
What i need to do if someone scripted to enter and play with scripts on my acc
So lets start 1 week ago i was palying some games with my friend and 1 of the said "are you playing lol right now" i said no and i saw someone playing on ranked oriana and im a adc main (Twitch) i enterd on the account for like 5 min and he did the same (tha guy that was playing on it).
After that i got a add by someone name Speechless and this is what he said. Look in the links

https://imgur.com/sCYyDHK

https://imgur.com/DqYMALt

Can someone from riot support team to see this i was playing on this account for over 3 years and now is perma ban because of someone else how is this fair.I hope i can recover it and sorry for the blured pictures.
im lucky because he changed only the username and when tha account got perma ban i was able to use it to post on forum.
